Question: VuPoint Solutions CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
VuPoint Solutions

Toucan Video Doorbell PRO

- 100% wire-free installation
- Accurate RADAR motion detection
- 2K Quad HD camera with night vision
- Two-way audio and IPX 56 weather resistance
- Available for product demo at CES Booth 52155

- 可在CES展位52155处观看产品演示
